import React from 'react' const RulsResults = () => { return (

Only Solo Matches are counted.
Only games played after you join the tournament are counted.
Smurfing (create new acconut to compete with) will result in an immediate and permanent ban from Repeat.gg and all winnings will be forfeited.
STANDARD POINT SCORING IN TOURNAMENTS :
Teams earn points for kills and position places in Warzone games. Final scores are a combination of your highest scoring games (Tournament registration card will outline how many,for example best 3 ).
1 point per kill.
1st place 15 points , 2nd place 10 points , 3rd place 9 points.

) } export default RulsResults
